function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective communication during a health crisis","Impact":"Increased risk attitude and perceived threat among tourists, leading to potential disregard of recommended safety measures","Mitigation":"Implement clear and consistent communication strategies, provide accurate information, and address perceived efficacy","Technologies":"Communication platforms and tools for mass dissemination of information","People":"Tourists, travelers, and individuals in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and tourism organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective safety campaigns against distracted driving","Impact":"Heightened risk of distracted driving resulting from mobile phone use, leading to increased road accidents and safety hazards","Mitigation":"Develop targeted and impactful safety campaigns with effective message content and structure","Technologies":"Digital media platforms, advertising tools, and message delivery systems","People":"Drivers, road users, and individuals at risk of distracted driving","Owner":"Transport authorities, road safety organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Misperception of pandemic threat and self-efficacy","Impact":"Underestimation of the seriousness of the pandemic, leading to non-compliance with recommended behaviors and safety measures","Mitigation":"Educate the public about the true threat of the pandemic and empower individuals with accurate information and strategies for risk reduction","Technologies":"Public health communication channels, social media platforms, and educational resources","People":"General public, individuals in affected areas, and communities at risk","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders, and government agencies"}]}
